user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you suggest some unique party themes and games that will make the celebration unforgettable? Also, I would love to have some interesting facts about coins to incorporate into the party decorations. Additionally, please provide me with the latest news about finance trends to keep the party conversation lively. Finally, recommend a good hotel in the city center for the party guests to stay overnight.

TaskList.description: Research and suggest unique party themes and games for a birthday celebration.
Gather interesting facts about coins for party decorations.
Fetch the latest news about finance trends to spice up the party conversation.
Recommend a good hotel in the city center for party guests to stay overnight.
